snippet.title: Hamelin's Journey
snippet.description:
Hamelin's Journey is inspired by Pokémon, Dragon Quest, Monster Rancher and other late 90s classics, this game tasks you to explore a mysterious world, capture and train the spirits that inhabit this realm and seek the timeless creature that lurks in the depth of the underground.

grab the game for free here : https://warrrkus.itch.io/hamelins-journey

the orignal soundtrack : https://xena-spectrale.bandcamp.com/album/hamelins-journey-ost

Made by Warkus & xena-spectrale

Warkus games : https://warrrkus.itch.io/
Warkus social : https://twitter.com/warrrkus

xena-spectrale games : https://xena-spectrale.itch.io/
xena-spectrale social : https://twitter.com/XENA_SN

art : https://xena-spectrale.net/
